name: Bible Studies
description: A bible studies tape in by R. B. Thieme, Jr that I found at a thriftstore. Having already collected other odd Christian items at that point, I added it to my cart

images.alt: The cover of the tape shows a drawing of a plumed helmet, a sword, and a coat of arms.
The back shows an image of the author as well as a short biography of the man.
Close up shot of the biography.
The inside of the box, showing the magnetic tape the doctrine is recorded on.

name: Bhagavad Gita
description: My roommate had been stopped by a few monks asking for donations while walking through Red Square. After giving $5, they handed them a bunch of literature which they left behind when they moved out.

images.alt: The cover of the book shows 2 people riding a carriage pulled by 4 white horses while 2 great armies prepare to fight in the background.
The back of the book
Page 226 and 227
Page 550 and 551

name: Final Events
description: Found in a ziplock bag on the bench inside the bus shelter among other religious items while I was waiting for the bus.

images.alt: A meteor is about to crash into a city while a bible sits open in the desert.
Labeling on the back says included on the disc is a bible study computer program.

name: Gaming Jesus
description: Handed out at a 2016 PAX West booth by some missionaries for the Game Church. Included at the booth was a cardboard cutout of Gaming Jesus.

images.alt: The cover shows Jesus in a red and blue robe holding a controller and wearing a headset.
Back side of the book describes why you should give reading this a try even if you aren't Chrisitan.
Describes basic information about the Game Church.
Table of contents.
Letter from Game Church founder.
Introduction page to the book.
Matrix reference of Red Pill Vs Blue Pill about reading more of the book.

name: Sri Isopanisad
description: Another one of the books that my roommate got after donating to monks in Red Square.

images.alt: The cover shows a four armed goddess with many snake heads behind her.
Text on the back claims the book contains wisdom from ancient times.
Page 76 and 77.
Page 104 and 105.

name: Self Realization
description: Another of the books from my roommate, this one is currently being used to create black out poetry.

images.alt: The cover shows a four armed goddess in the dark with electrons orbiting around her.
The back claims the book contains timeless science.
The foreward of the book.
The table of contents.
Section titled 'Crime: Why And What To Do?', along with a picture of the author.
Page 248 before blackout poetry.
Blackout poem using page 248.

name: Meaning of Life
description: Found by the wooden fence seperating the customer parking lot from the employee lot.

images.alt: Silhouette of a person at the beach with the sun reflecting on the water.
The three main sections: 'Your Reality', 'Your Hope', 'Your Destiny'.
The inner fold and back side reinforce the ideas of the main content..

name: Srimad Bhagvatam
description: The final one of the books that my roommate got after donating to monks in Red Square. It was the first one that I opened, and the page I flipped to had the word 'nuclear weapon' on it so I knew I was in for a treat.

images.alt: The cover shows a glimpse into a paradise of gods inside of a lotus flower. The book contains the first 8 chapters.
The back claims the book reveals trancendental science by which you can discover your true self.
Page 336 and 337.
Aforementioned page about nuclear weapons. (Page 322)
